article.article: Motorola One Vision specifications have surfaced online ahead of any formal confirmation. The leaked specifications show that the smartphone will sport a 48-megapixel primary sensor and come with a 21:9 display. The latest revelation also corroborates a previously spotted Geekbench listing and highlights the presence of a Samsung Exynos 9610 SoC. The Motorola One Vision is speculated to arrive as the Motorola P40 in China along with a Snapdragon 675 SoC. It is said to be in development with codename "Robusta2".
article.title: Motorola One Vision Specifications Include Exynos 9610 SoC, 48-Megapixel Primary Camera: Report
